ygData.subject: Last post untill Monday
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: I will be leaving untill Monday. It be easier if no one messed with my chars. That way I can just pick up when I get back. And KSL, dont underestimate Hot

OOC: I will be leaving untill Monday. It be easier if no one messed with
my chars. That way I can just pick up when I get back. 

And KSL, dont underestimate Hot Rod. And in his new body I gave him he
is 15 feet tall. Unicron doesn't tower him anymore.

::Hot Rod::

"Heh."
He simply destroys the missiles with optics.

OOC: Ok, see ya all later.
